Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: In these posts people are demanding immediate action from politicians regarding payments and poverty intervention in the Federal Budget. They are urging AlboMP JEChalmers and the government to take their recommendations seriously and #RaiseTheRate for JobSeekers and related payments. Additionally people hope to see a continued focus on gender equality investments in future budgets and appreciate the work of 'the Taskforce' in providing guidance amidst a tight fiscal environment.
